channel.title: Does anybody want to start a server with me?
channel.description:
I've tried port forwarding several times, and it never works on any of my computers. I've tried at my friends house, ETC and still nothing. I cannot port forward for seemingly any game, even minecraft! So I've given up home on hosting my own, but I would love it if someone hosted it for me, or wanted to do a dual partnership type deal. I'll make and host the website for the server, and you make and host the game (I honestly couldn't care less about the decisions you make about the game). The only thing I'd ask is that in-game I become a mod/admin. If you will help me with this, please PM me and I'll send you a link where we can discuss more plans.
ALSO: I know a lot of you are going to say "BUY A VPS YOU CHEAP NUB". I've honestly considered doing that, but I don't know how to code an RSPS anyway, so buying one would be pointless (as I couldn't even maintain it). I would be wasting money on a VPS that I can't even use.
Anyway, thanks! ~Isabell

item.title: Does anybody want to start a server with me?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you wish to start a development team, please visit the link that Null Amount provided. Otherwise, these type of topics are not allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anybody want to start a server with me?

item.title: Does anybody want to start a server with me?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Try the Development Teams section.

Read full topic
